reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, not itchy at all, and appreciate its soft material and high-quality fabric. The style receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it keeps looking fresh and new, while another mentions it's perfect for long sweater with leggings. The fit and length receive mixed reviews - while some find it a nice basic sweater, others say it runs a little large, and while some love the length, others find it too long. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Made!
items.body: Runs a little large - my normal medium was returned for a small. Super cute and comfortable and the perfect length for my 5'5" height. Read more
items.author: Jodi D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Beautiful
items.body: Great little sweater dress that fit perfectly. I got the recommended size and it was awesome. It’s thick enough that you don’t need to layer on cool days but thin enough that you could layer for extra warmth. Easily dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: Kristen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Long if you size up
items.body: Do not size up!!! It was very long on me but well made and comfy Read more
items.author: Caitlin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Love it! I love the fabric, I can tell it’s good quality, the fabric has a little stretch and it is soft. Love the fit and that it’s well made. I’ve ordered multiple pieces from Zesica and I’m really satisfied with all of them, great quality and value! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sweater dress
items.body: The arm ripped off the first time I wore it, a hole started on the back and the entire seam unraveled. I sewed it back together and washed it. Another new hole opened in the front, so this dress is trash - fell apart after one wear/wash. Terrible poor quality, don't waste your money. Read more
items.author: Pillowtalk

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and made well BUT....,
items.body: I received the super cute sweater dress and when I pulled it out of the bag, all I could smell was someone else's perfume when I looked at it. It had snacks on it, and I could see make up around the collar. Someone clearly wore this all day and then shipped it back and Either Amazon or the vendor didn't check the product on return and just shipped it back out and I received a used damaged sweater. Sent it back requested a exchange hopefully the new one will be NEW!!! Once I receive my replacement, I will give the new item a review Read more
items.author: julie jordan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress
items.body: Super cute and good material. Perfect length and not see through at all. True to size and super soft but not too hot Read more
items.author: Hailey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommend
items.body: So cute and comfy! Fabric is great quality and fit me true to size Read more
items.author: Ashley G

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Lightblue, Apricot, Black, Armygreen, Red, Navy, Almond, Khaki, Lightcamel, White, Beige, Darkviolet. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
